name: Mini Mall Maker
description:
Created for Gosu Game Jam 3! This game is open-source on GitHub.

You've got a plot of land - now build a mall that customers will love!

Attract visitors by constructing new stores, listening to customer feedback, and advertising to your target demographic.

Credits

Storefront blurred backgrounds: Unsplash
Storefront emblems: Icons8

Music: "A Conversation with Saul", Matthew Pablo on OpenGameArt.org

Menu click SFX: NenadSimic on OpenGameArt.org
Place building SFX: OpenGameArt.org
